## Matrix4x4.getNearPlaneWidth() method

Get width of the near clip plane.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getNearPlaneWidth(): number;
```
**Returns:**

number

Width of the near clip plane

## Remarks

This method assumes that this is a projection matrix (perspective or orthogonal).
